title: Reinforcement Learning-Based Curriculum Design for Multi-Agent Resource Collection

context.prior_knowledge: Basic programming knowledge and comprehension of simple reinforcement learning concepts
context.additional_context: Learners Access Non-Real-Time LMS in Smartphone-Based Environments and Study Multi-Agent Collaboration Concepts for Language Domain Application

learning_goals: Learners can explain resource collection strategies utilizing environmental signals (stigmergy) in multi-agent systems.
Learners can implement step-by-step agent collaboration policies by applying reinforcement learning-based curriculum design.
Learners can simulate and optimize implicit communication mechanisms between agents under limited environmental conditions.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
